title: Riot steal IP
body: guys i made that discussion bec riot he steal ip i buy a project box and i lost 6000 ip riot steal u guys !!! if have the same problem post samthing here .  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I'd like to help you out with this, but I'm not really sure what issue you're experiencing.  Which project box were you attempting to purchase?  The icon cache can be purchased for either 75 RP, or 750 IP.  Let me know!
